    Product Updates

    Below are recent product updates.
    If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on product Updates document.

    Video Cloud

    Feature: The Ingestion profile is now displayed in the Video Files panel in the Media module

    Product Area: Media

    Date: 18-November-2022

    Description: The ingestion profile is now displayed in the Video Files panel in the Media Module

    Status: Released

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Cloud Playout - multiple programs for non-looping channels

    Product Area: Studio

    Date: 11-November-2022

    Description: For non-looping Cloud Playout channels, you add new programs to the channel as needed, or re-link a program to update its contents.

    Status: Released

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Image Token API

    Product Area: Platform APIs

    Date: 28-October-2022

    Description: Create, update, and delete tokens for the Image API

    Status: Released

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Sitecore Connector for Video Cloud

    Product Area: Integrations

    Date: 21-October-2022

    Description: Updated with instructions on working with labels and folders

    Status: Released

    Go to Documentation
